column2: This character is patrilineally descended from the founder of Consumerism.
This character is descended from one of the Investors, the nine companions of the Prophet of Consumerism.
This character is matrilineally descended from the founder of Consumerism.

The Confederated Church of Canada was formed from the unification of the Anglican Church and the Ursuline See. The head of the Church is the Prime Minister, who also serves as an advisor to the Emperor of Canada.

column2: This bishop is probably next in line for a Cardinalship when one becomes available.
column3: Cet évêque sera probablement le prochain cardinal dès qu'une place se libérera.
column4: Dieser Bischof wird wahrscheinlich als nächster zum Kardinal ernannt, wenn ein Sitz im Kollegium frei wird.
column6: Este obispo será, probablemente, el próximo Cardenal cuando haya una vacante.

column2: Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Cardinal by the Abbess-General.
column3: De tous les évêques de mon royaume, celui-ci est le plus susceptible d'être nommé cardinal par le pape.
column4: Von allen Bischöfen in meinem Reich wird dieser wahrscheinlich am ehesten vom Papst zum Kardinal ernannt.
column6: De todos los obispos de mi Reino, este es el que tiene más probabilidades de que el Papa lo nombre Cardenal.

column2: This bishop is probably next in line for a Cardinalship when one becomes available.
column3: Cet évêque sera probablement le prochain cardinal dès qu'une place se libérera.
column4: Dieser Bischof wird wahrscheinlich als nächster zum Kardinal ernannt, wenn ein Sitz im Kollegium frei wird.
column6: Este obispo será, probablemente, el próximo Cardenal cuando haya una vacante.

column2: Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Cardinal by the Pope.
column3: De tous les évêques de mon royaume, celui-ci est le plus susceptible d'être nommé cardinal par le pape.
column4: Von allen Bischöfen in meinem Reich wird dieser wahrscheinlich am ehesten vom Papst zum Kardinal ernannt.
column6: De todos los obispos de mi Reino, este es el que tiene más probabilidades de que el Papa lo nombre Cardenal.

column2: This bishop is probably next in line for an Apostleship when one becomes available.
Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get called as an Apostle.

The closest American equivalent to the government of the Japanese and Russian colonies is the merchant republic. However, unlike American merchant republics, the Japanese and Russian colonies do not have a tradition of religious freedom. The viceroyalty changes between the five major colonial families through special elections. Colonists can also build a network of Trade Posts, even in the counties of other powers.

The bureaucratic system of California is similar to the Feudal system - rulers must rely on land holding vassals or varying loyalty and ambition. Rulers are allowed to reorganize their realm, revoking Prefectural titles and retracting vassals, but otherwise are not allowed to imprison vassals or revoke their titles unless they have broken the law. The maximum number of vassals and the number of Holdings you can directly own are controlled by the Centralization Law. If you should convert to a non-Cetic religion, your government form will change to Feudal.
column3: Le système arabe de l'Iqtâ est similaire au système féodal  les souverains doivent faire appel à des vassaux pour tenir leurs fiefs et leur degré d'ambition ou de loyauté peut varier. Le nombre maximal de vassaux et le nombre de fiefs que vous pouvez directement posséder sont contrôlés par la loi de centralisation. Cependant, il n'y a qu'une seule forme de succession disponible  la succession « ouverte » chaotique, selon laquelle le fils qui détient le plus de terres est en droit d'hériter. Si vous vous convertissez à une religion de type non musulman, votre gouvernement sera de type féodal.
column4: Das arabische Iqtasystem ähnelt dem Feudalsystem. Auch hier muss der Herrscher auf möglicherweise unzuverlässige Vasallen vertrauen. In den Zentralisierungsgesetzen ist festgelegt, wie viele Liegenschaften und wie viele Vasallen Ihr maximal haben könnt. Allerdings gibt es bei der Erbfolge nur eine einzige Variante: das chaotische 'offene' System, bei dem immer der Sohn mit dem größten Landbesitz erbt. Wenn Ihr zu einer nicht-islamischen Religion konvertiert, wechselt Eure Staatsform zum Feudalsystem.
column6: El sistema árabe del Iqta es similar al sistema feudal - los gobernantes deben depender de vasallos con posesiones territoriales de variable lealtad y ambición. El número máximo número de vasallos y de posesiones que puedes poseer directamente puedes poseer están controlados por la ley de centralización. Sin embargo, sólo existe una forma de sucesión: la caótica 'abierta', donde hereda el hijo con más tierras. Si te conviertes a una religión no musulmana tu forma de gobierno cambiará a feudal.

column2: [Root.GetDynName] adopted a Bureaucratic system in [Root.GetHerHis] domains, abandoning the old tribal ways.
column3: [Root.GetDynName] a adopté un système d'iqta dans son domaine, abandonnant les anciennes coutumes tribales.
column4: [Root.GetDynName] gab das Leben als Stamm auf und übernahm das Iqtasystem in [Root.GetHerHis] Gebiet.
column6: [Root.GetDynName] adoptó un sistema Iqta en [Root.GetHerHis] dominios, abandonando las viejas costumbres tribales.

column2: [Root.GetDynName] adopted a Bureaucratic system in [Root.GetHerHis] domains, leaving their old nomad life behind them.
column3: [Root.GetDynName] a adopté un système d'iqta dans son domaine, abandonnant son mode de vie nomade.
column4: [Root.GetDynName] gab das Nomadendasein auf und übernahm das Iqtasystem in [Root.GetHerHis] Gebiet.
column6: [Root.GetDynName] adoptó un sistema Iqta en dominios de [Root.GetHerHis], dejando atrás su vida nómada.

column2: Californian Imperialism, much like the ordinary Feudal government, revolves around vassals owing fealty to their liege who in this case is considered to be the divine Child of Heaven, and ruler of all. The Imperial government is unique to those who claim they are the true Emperor of California, and can only be implemented by an Emperor capable of backing this claim with force...
You will reform the Imperial bureaucracy of the Californian Empire.

Under Chinese Imperialism you:
§Y*§! Can hold cities
§Y*§! Do not care if others do not follow your religion nor can you demand their conversion
§Y*§! Do not get opinion penalties with vassals of other government types
§Y*§! Can not create or usurp Empires
§Y*§! Are limited to non-elective succession laws

In the better days of the Californian Empire, the Evaluator of Merit was responsible for assessing all applicants for government positions. Today, as positions are usually filled by friends and relatives of rulers instead of qualified civil servants, the position of Evaluator of Merit is wholly ceremonial, but it still holds a good deal of prestige.
The Grand Herald is charged with greeting visitors to the court and ensuring they show proper respect to the ruler.
The Commandant of Gardens is responsible for the upkeep of the parks and waterways of the capital.
The Keeper of Equipages is responsible for maintaining the ruler's stable and keeping the roads clear for official business.
The Libationer is an essential part of court protocol, responsible for maintaining the royal vineyards, keeping the palace's wine cellar well stocked, and serving distinguished guests at the court.
\nCould it be a piece of a chupacabra?
\nCould it be a piece of a loogaroo?
\nCould it be a piece of the mighty Hodag?
\nCould it be a piece of a skunk ape?
\nCould it be a piece of the Mothman?
\nCould it be a piece of the Jersey Devil?
\nCould it be a piece of a wicked wendigo?
\nCould it be a piece of the reclusive sasquatch?
\nCould it be a piece of the Nagual?
\nCould it be a piece of Huay Chivo?
\nCould it be a piece of a celestial vistor?
\nCould it be a piece of the Thunderbird?
\nCould it be a piece of La Patasola?
\nCould it be a piece of El Silbon?
This little bone is said to have come from a great saint.
A statue of the Virgin Mary. Every now and then, a drop of water or even blood will trickle down from the statue's eyes, in what can only be described as a miracle.
An ancient Old World document, written by The Founders. Much of the text is illegible, and the parchment is brittle to the touch.
An ancient bust of a Founder.
Glassware from the ancient world, finer than anything modern glassblowers can produce.
Jewelery from the ancient world, more intricate than anything modern artisans can produce.
An ancient, shiny device that contains the melodies of the Old World.
A fabulously preserved piece of Old World machinery, constructed of a miraculous metal and blessed so that it shall never rust.
This sacred bonsai is ancient beyond memory. Could it predate the Event?
Insightful pronouncements and decrees, penned in elaborate calligraphy by the Emperor himself.
A famous and well-preserved treatise, written by the first Emperor.
A piece of heavenly metal that fell to Earth.
The ashes of a Revelationist martyr, cremated in accordance with the ancient rites.
An enormous iron egg emblazoned with the sacred trefoil. When the time is right, it will hatch and Atomos will be reborn.
A lovingly restored and functional pre-calamity firearm.
A functional pre-calamity mechanical calculating device.
A polished and ticking pre-calamity clockwork timekeeper.
A carefully maintained pre-calamity mechanical lettering device.
A restored and functional pre-calamity portable telescope.
A small collection of intact pre-calamity academic books.
A restored and functional pre-calamity magnetic compass.
The only piece of the raiment of Mictlantecuhtli left on Earth when he ascended from the underworld to assume his current place in the sky.
An enormous, steely-blue diamond. Some of its owners have met unfortunate ends, leading to rumors that it is cursed.
An egg-sized skull carved from a single enormous, flawless emerald. Some claim that it is imbued with divine power that wards its owner against harm.
A massive, smoothly polished star sapphire. It possesses a vivid blue color with a strikingly clear star, and is reputed to bring its owner vast wealth.
A trophy taken from a beast that was terrorizing the countryside. [This.GetBeastString]
A large silver chalice, engraved with the names of northern martyrs and holy warriors. You must be a victorious hero to drink its waters, lest your blood turn to ice in your veins.

Left behind by Archangel Michael after the Great Tribulation, this golden sword is said to have originated in God's armory. It would be blasphemy of the highest order to shed human blood with it, but as a ceremonial relic it proves divine right to rule.
The gleaming horn of the Archangel Gabriel, sounded to devastating effect at the onset of the Great Tribulation and left behind on Earth in preparation for the final doom that must eventually follow.

The mummified hand of Petrus Romanus, grasping the gavel of the dreadful judge. Although Petrus Romanus was destroyed when he placed his hand upon the gavel, humanity was spared and the final judgment postponed.
A staff of living wood, wrapped in vines of gold and topped with a pine cone. It has been kept alive for centuries, and blooms every year to announce the spring.

Given by Thunderbird to a great warrior in a time beyond living memory, the Thunderbird Whistle superficially resembles a ceremonial eagle bone whistle. A learned holy man can discern its true nature, and wield its power.
A set of sacred ritual objects, passed down through generations of holy people and handled only by them.
A golden idol of Oscar, an ancient guru famous for his long sermons concerning appreciativeness.

A reclining stone figure that functions as a sacrificial altar and as the throne of the rightful Emperor of All. It holds a bloody bowl and polished obsidian mirror, to allow a glimpse into the realm of the gods.
An ornate altar in the shape of a reclining man with his head turned to the side, holding a bowl that has received hundreds of human hearts.
A simple silver key.\nIt MUST NEVER be used.
Two seer stones, transparent and bound with silver into a pair of spectacles. Personally worn by Joseph Smith when he received divine revelations.
An instrument of revelation that allows the bearer to discern the will of God. It takes the form of a simple stone.
A fragment of the original temple in Nauvoo, preserved through the devastation of the Event.
A potent charm, inscribed with magic to ward off evil spirits.
A black granite tablet engraved with a timeless warning:\n"Do not call up that which you cannot put down."
Crown of the Lion of Judah
A golden leonine headdress, ancient beyond memory. It is an unmistakable symbol of power and sovereignty.
King Maxwell's famous iron shirt is an inspiration to all who seek to drive evil from the battlefield.

A sacred war banner that has been stained by blood many times, but has never once touched the ground. It holds the image of a black cat, an animal reviled by "civilized" faiths but revered as an omen of good luck by pagans.
A mummified monkey's paw reputed to fulfill the possessor's desires in costly, unnatural ways.
A disk of gold approximately twelve inches across, that predates the Event. It is inscribed with hundreds of fine grooves, as well as strange intricate hieroglyphs.
A large seven-branched menorah made of solid gold. It closely matches surviving descriptions of the menorah that once resided in the Holy Temple.

A white banner, adorned with a blue Star of David and flanked by two blue stripes. Although simple in design, it is nevertheless capable of inspiring Jewish warriors to fight bravely on the field of battle.

This handwritten Torah scroll, containing all 304,805 letters of the Hebrew Torah, was copied onto parchment long before the Event occurred. Pre-Event Sifrei Torah are highly sought after by Jewish religious and historical scholars alike.

This elaborate, jewel-encrusted crown was used by the antediluvian Catholic Church in their coronation ceremonies. It was rumored that a papal tiara was sent to Washington for safekeeping before the Deluge. These rumors have been confirmed.
A strangely well-crafted quern, bearing a striking resemblance to the Mill of Fortune. It is said to be able to produce gold, flour and salt from nothing at all.
column3: Un moulin à bras étrangement bien travaillé, ressemblant de façon frappante au Moulin de la Fortune. On dit qu'il est capable de produire de l'or, de la farine et du sel à partir de rien.
column4: Ein ungewöhnlich sorgfältig gearbeiteter Mühlstein mit einer verblüffenden Ähnlichkeit zur Zaubermühle. Wie es heißt, kann sie Gold, Mehl und Salz mahlen, ohne dass man sie jemals füllen müsste.
column6: Un molinillo de mano sumamente bien elaborado, con un parecido sorprendente al molinillo de la fortuna. Se dice que es capaz de fabricar oro, harina y sal de la nada.

column2: A piece of bark that has grown into the shape of a trio of visages. The trio's unsettling gazes pierce one's soul, almost as if some form of spirit still remains behind their eyes...
column3: Un morceau d'écorce qui a pris la forme de plusieurs visages. Les trois regards troublants transpercent l'âme, presque comme si une certaine forme d'esprit restait derrière leurs yeux...
column4: Ein Stück Rinde, das so gewachsen ist, dass seine Form ein Trio aus Gesichtern bildet. Der unheimliche Blick der Drei dringt dem Betrachter bis tief in die Seele, ganz so als ob hinter den Augen noch immer ein Fünkchen Leben wohnte.
column6: Un pedazo de corteza con la forma de tres rostros. Las inquietantes miradas del trío penetran en tu alma, casi como si existiera alguna clase de espíritu tras sus ojos...

column2: The King James Bible has been the gold standard of all English-language bibles for over a millennium. However, only twelve complete pre-Event copies of the King James Bible are known to exist today, and the text is indecipherable without special training.

Once common during festivals in New Orleans, these plastic beads were distributed to anyone who attended these events before the Event. Plastic is now a rare commodity, but not too uncommon, often found by peasants and farmers from time to time.
This golden fencing saber was won from a mysterious stranger clad in black. It is rumored to be imbued with supernatural power, giving its owner the ability to win in any sword fight.
This golden falconry glove was won from a mysterious stranger clad in black. It is rumored to be imbued with supernatural power, giving its owner the ability to see through the falcon's eyes.
This golden bow was won from a mysterious stranger clad in black. It is rumored to be imbued with supernatural power, giving its owner inhuman accuracy.
This golden chalice was won from a mysterious stranger clad in black. It is rumored to be imbued with supernatural power, allowing its owner to drink forever without losing their wits.
Tinted glasses from the ancient world, clearer than anything modern craftsmen can produce. Although they do not correct a person's vision, they can effectively shield one's eyes from harsh light.
This little bone is said to have come from one of the ancient liberators of South America.
The Ark, crafted out of shittim wood at God's direction, containing the stone tablets of the Ten Commandments and a pot of manna.
column3: L'Arche, fabriquée en bois d'acacia sur les instructions de Dieu, contenant les tablettes en pierre des Dix Commandements et un pot de manne.
column4: Die Bundeslade, die nach Gottes Anweisungen aus Shittim-Holz gefertigt wurde, enthält die Steintafeln mit den Zehn Geboten und einen Krug mit Manna.
column6: Esta arca, hecha con madera de acacia bajo la dirección de Dios, contiene una jarra de maná y las tablillas de piedra en las que se grabaron los diez mandamientos.

column2: This little bone is said to have come from an incredibly wise and knowledgeable rabbi.
Left Hand of the Lubavitcher Rebbe
The remains of the left hand of the Lubavitcher Rebbe, the last great pre-Event Chabad Rebbe. While he was alive, some believed he could have been the Moshiach.

These small black leather boxes contain scrolls of parchment with Torah verses inscribed on them. This tefillin dates to before the Event, and, although it is too fragile for everyday use, it is still a valuable item.

The multicolored beads on this necklace represent each of the primary Orishas, and represent a point of contact with each Orisha. They are sacred items in the Yoruba-derived syncretic faiths of the Caribbean and beyond.
This codex contains a surprisingly large number of small portraits featuring the Founders, the Statue of Liberty, and other Americanist holy icons.
This portrait depicts one of the ancient Presidents a strikingly detailed and accurate way. It is said that this portrait may give advice to worthy rulers if asked.
This expensive-looking set of false teeth once belonged to George Washington himself. It features teeth made of ivory set on a wooden frame and held together by golden springs.
This cloth banner is said to have been sewed by Betsy Ross herself and carried by the original patriots during their battles against the dreaded redcoats in the early days of America.
The legendary companion to the Declaration, this document was once thought lost to time. Although the text is now illegible, it still contains the very soul of America.
This peculiar pre-Event watch uses the power of the Holy Atom to light up in the dark, allowing one to read it at any hour and in any environment.
This device makes a noise when in the presence of the Holy Atom. As the Atom can be neither seen nor felt, it is a highly sacred and useful tool.
This collection of substances constitutes a particularly strong and pure vessel of the Holy Atom, and as such should be treated with the utmost care and respect.

This vessel of the Holy Atom is particularly potent, but it has a reputation of cursing those who attempt to bless themselves with it. Although it is still a holy item, some view it with distrust and scorn.
This codex contains a surprisingly large amount of coinage. Surely, whoever first compiled this codex must have been a high priest of the Almighty Dollar!
Issued by the Holy Mint during the days of old America, this single piece of paper contains the power and value of many thousands of dollars.
Issued by a temple of the Almighty Dollar in the American Southwest, this ordinary-looking chip is actually made of highly precious and valuable metals.

This diamond is said to be the largest and most valuable of its kind on the entire planet, and it is hard to dispute this claim. Although it was lost within a web of transactions, it has finally been tracked down.
A fragment of the Cross Jesus was crucified upon
column3: Un fragment de la Croix sur laquelle Jésus a été crucifié.
column4: Ein Teil des Kreuzes, auf dem Jesus gekreuzigt wurde.
column6: Una parte de la cruz en la que se crucificó a Jesús.

column2: A finger belonging to St. John the Baptist. St. John was a prophet of the Messiah, and was also the one to baptize Jesus.
column3: Un doigt appartenant à saint Jean-Baptiste. Saint Jean était un prophète du Messie, et fut aussi celui qui devait baptiser Jésus.
column4: Ein Finger des hl. Johannes des Täufers. Johannes der Täufer war ein Jünger des Messias, von dem Jesus getauft wurde.
column6: Un dedo perteneciente a san Juan Bautista. San Juan fue un profeta del Mesías, y también fue quien bautizó a Jesús.

column2: This massively ornate tome was one of the first Bibles to be manufactured without oversight of the Pope, and is therefore holy to those denominations of Christendom that do not recognize papal authority.
This ordinary-looking piece of limestone is said to be the very stone upon which the Holy Cross was raised during Jesus's execution.

This silver-plated church bell is holy to both Anglicans and Métis, and these two groups have warred over its possession for centures. It is no longer possible to tell who possessed it first or how its current owner came to hold it.

This glass case contains a single rugged black hair. Pirates from Haiti to Newfoundland will recognize it part of the legendary Black Beard of Edward Teach, and will treat it with the reverence it deserves.
This simple map has existed for as long as piracy itself has, and the large red X on it indicates the precise spot at which an ancient pirate buried an immeasurably large amount of booty.
This chest of booty was found using an ancient treasure map, and it certainly deserves the reputation it has built up over the centuries.
A fragment of teh flagship Blackbeard used to plunder his goods from the dreaded redcoats.
This bizarre-looking skull is made of a single piece of a crystal. Although its precise origin is hotly-debated, nobody doubts its divine nature.
This codex was compiled by the ancestors of the Nahua in the days before the colonizers conquered Mexico, and contains an accurate account of pre-arrival Mesoamerican culture.
This headdress once belonged to Motecuhzoma Xocoyotzin himself, and was on his head when he was captured by the conquistador Cortés. It now inspires Mesoamerican warriors on the field of battle.

This idol depicts America Kokudo Kunitama-no-Kami, divine protector of the North American continent. Although Japanese in origin, it has been part of the Cetic pantheon since the days of Emperor Elton.

This dazzling jewel-encrusted slipper is said to possess supernatural qualities - if one manages to find both shoes, they can can be used to instantly transport someone "home" by clicking their heels thrice.

This golden falcon is said to have been crafted on a mythical island in the Old World, and was thought to be lost to time. People can and have gone to great lengths to get their hands on this priceless treasure.

This finely-crafted katana was wielded by Emperor Elton himself during his conquest of Socal, and it was used to strike down the heathen ruler of Los Angeles in the decisive battle that ended the war.

This cross-section of a redwood tree was collected prior to the Event and marked along the rings with numbers indicating how old each part of the tree is. It is a useful reference for discovering tree ages today.
This crystal glows with an otherworldly energy, and can ward off even the most serious of illnesses if applied to the site of pollution for long enough.
Although this wreath of flowers appears to be normal at first glance, none of the flowers decorating it have ever so much as wilted.
This wooden core is no ordinary cross-section - it is part of the legendary tree Methuselah, and is thus older than any religion on this continent.
This peculiar-looking artifact is said to be supercharged with healing energy, allowing its wearer to heal injuries and recover from illness with ease.
This feather headdress belonged to a legendary Native warrior long before the Event, and was worn in ancient battles against the colonizers.
This medicine cord was crafted by an Apache medicine man before the Event. It is made of animal hide and punctuated with beads and shells.
This firearm once belonged to the legendary Lakotah chief Sitting Bull, and was used in his war against the Americans. It was the last Lakotah rifle to be surrendered to American forces.
The skull of the legendary Apache medicine man Geronimo, unjustly stolen by a secret Americanist society long before the event. It has now been returned to its rightful owners.
This intimidating-looking instrument produces a sound that sounds eerily similar to a person screaming in pain. Mesoamerican natives use them on the field of battle to intimidate their foes.
It is said to have once belonged to a great Emperor. \nWriten upon it's blade are words "Light to raise, weighty to descend."
Once it spat fire and lead on enemies of your kin. \nNow it's merely reminder of what was lost.
